entry.title: $2342 // Dunham Place Luxury 1BR w/ Terrace Views, Gym, Lounge and More
entry.content:
414 Hicks St

The building at 414 Hicks Street, in Cobble Hill Brooklyn has no fee studio, one and two bedroom apartments. The apartments feature new bamboo floors, modern kitchens with new stainless steel appliances, spacious bedrooms with great closet space. Building amenities include a large courtyard for tenants to enjoy, fitness center, onsite parking, virtual doorman, live in super, and on-site laundry facility. 414 Hicks is conveniently located to transportation. The immediate area in the Columbus Street Waterfront District in Cobble Hill is a great neighborhood near the waterfront, parks and conveniently located.

Amenities: 414 Hicks Street
